awards.text: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.

fullplot: When Charlie Brown complains about the overwhelming materialism that he sees amongst everyone during the Christmas season, Lucy suggests that he become director of the school Christmas paegent. Charlie Brown accepts, but it proves to be a frustrating struggle. When an attempt to restore the proper spirit with a forlorn little fir Christmas tree fails, he needs Linus' help to learn what the real meaning of Christmas is.
plot: Repelled by the commercialism he sees around him, Charlie Brown tries to find the true meaning of Christmas.
title: A Charlie Brown Christmas
